text: Avaṉ avarkaḷai pātukāttuk koṇṭālō avarkaḷ (karai cērnta) accamayamē niyāyamiṉṟi pūmiyil aniyāyam ceyyat talaippaṭukiṉṟaṉar. Maṉitarkaḷē! Uṅkaḷ aṭāta ceyalkaḷ uṅkaḷukkē kēṭāka muṭiyum. (Ataṉāl) ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyil ciṟitu cukam aṉupavikkalām. Piṉṉarō nam'miṭamtāṉ nīṅkaḷ tirumpa varavēṇṭiyatirukkiṟatu. Nīṅkaḷ ceytu koṇṭiruntavai evai eṉpatai accamayam nām uṅkaḷukku aṟivittu viṭuvōm
